Portfolio

About

I help businesses by providing savvy front-end development for websites and applications, delivering innovative web-based business solutions. Businesses and professionals enjoy working with me because I am passionate, dedicated, and provide a range of comprehensive digital marketing services to impact business.

My talents extend, covering a wide range of technical skills, deep knowledge of lean and agile methodologies, and an artistic designer’s eye for visual detail and drive for innovation.

Connect with me today to learn how I can elevate your business to the next level.

Around the Web

Marketer Workspace

An internal marketing campaign platform for IBM's global marketing teams. Technology Stack: **API, AngularJS, Typescript, ES6, Node, Karma, Jasmine, Protractor, Grunt, SASS, HTML5, CSS3, Git**
  • Role: Applications Developer
  • Project Dates: May 2015 - June 2017
  • Posted: August 2017

IBM Cloud Computing

A public facing website for IBM Cloud website. We dramatically increased traffic, awareness, purchase of cloud services, and established best practices to scale to global production teams. Technology Stack: **CMS, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, Git**
  • Role: Frontend Developer Lead
  • Project Dates: May 2015 - February 2014
  • Posted: August 2017

IBM Think Management

An intranet web application that enables IBM managers to share and learn management practices. Technology Stack: **IBM ECM, IBM Connections API, Dojo, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, SVN**
  • Role: Frontend Developer Lead
  • Project Dates: August 2012 - August 2014
  • Posted: August 2017

Coca-Cola Mix'On

Developed for LBi an interactive questionnaire for Coca-Cola and American Music Awards.

Technology Stack: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3

  • Role: Frontend Developer
  • Project Dates: July 2012 - August 2012
  • Posted: August 2017

Qnasl Device Tour

Developed for Heartbeat Ideas an interactive 360° tour of a nasal spray.

Technology Stack: Sencha Animator, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3

  • Role: Interactive Developer
  • Project Dates: December 2011 - February 2012
  • Posted: August 2017

The Weinstein Company

Initially developed using Adobe Flash and ActionScript, I created many websites for the Weinstein Company, including their corporate sites. Around 2010, we started migrating sites to social media platforms and Wordpress.

Technology Stack: Wordpress, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Flash, ActionScript

  • Role: Senior Interactive Developer
  • Project Dates: August 2007 - March 2012
  • Posted: August 2017
